meanings.sent1: The postexercise stretching routine helped relax my muscles.
meanings.sent2: She felt tired but accomplished after her postexercise walk.
meanings.sent3: The postexercise cooldown dance party was a hit with the gym members.
meanings.sent4: The postexercise calm enveloped her like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The postexercise glow on her face showed her hard work paid off.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period following exercise.
meanings.sent1: His postexercise snack consisted of a banana and some water.
meanings.sent2: The postexercise soreness reminded her of the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The postexercise chatter in the gym was filled with laughter and stories.
meanings.sent4: The postexercise silence in the park was a stark contrast to the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The postexercise routine became a comforting part of her day.
